settings.default.pageSize.description: Default paging size for collection related REST requests

settings.includeAll.pageSize.description: Default paging size to use when using the includeAll option, which fetches all results from Cumulocity

settings.includeAll.delayMS.description: Delay in millieconds between fetching the next result when using the includeAll option. If value is 0 or less, then it will be ignored
